misc: Primary organizer of the Hector Trophée event.
biography: Toni, a distinguished member of Hirsala Golf, is not only a formidable competitor but also the primary organizer of the prestigious Hector Trophée. His dedication to the sport extends beyond his personal achievements, shaping the very fabric of this esteemed tournament.

With an impressive record of 11 appearances in the Hector Trophée, Toni's experience is undeniable. His strategic acumen and unwavering focus have led him to secure the coveted Hector Trophée on three occasions. Furthermore, his individual prowess is exemplified by his two Victor Trophy titles, solidifying his status as a true all-rounder.

Known for his meticulous planning and attention to detail, Toni brings a unique blend of organizational skill and competitive spirit to the golf course. As he prepares for his 12th appearance at Hector Trophée 2025, anticipation is high to witness his continued contributions both on and off the green. While his accomplishments speak for themselves, Toni remains a humble and respected figure among his peers.
